lines.text: Stop the pigeon, / Stop the pigeon, / Stop the pigeon, / Stop the pigeon, / Stop the pigeon, / Stop the pigeon. / Owwwww, nab him, jab him, tab him, grab him, stop that pigeon now!

[after every attempt fails]
Drat! And Double Drat!

[Every time Klunk speaks to Dastardly]
What'd he say? What'd he say?
